<h1 align="center">Generic query param</h1>

<h3 align="center"><em>Useful to create Query string with a DTO in Typescript.</em></h3>

```ts
const queryParams: QueryParams<MyEntity> = {
	id: 1,
	name: "R2-D2",
};
```
Into

```ts
"id=1&name=R2-D2"
```
</br>
Have fun
